survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients about their experiences with dental care services to improve service quality and patient satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and hygiene of the dental clinic?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and hygiene of the dental clinic?

questions.question_text: Which of the following dental services have you used in the past year? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following dental services have you used in the past year? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for your most recent dental visit?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover common reasons for dental visits.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for your most recent dental visit?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism and friendliness of the dental staff?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency with other rating questions.

script.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism and friendliness of the dental staff?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding your dental care experience.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding your dental care experience.
